basic_information.scholarship_name: UCO Women in Safety Endowed Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to female students within the College of Education & Professional Studies pursuing a degree in Industrial/Occupational Safety. Eligibility Requirements Full-time undergraduate student Minimum 2.5 GPA Female Major in Occupational or Industrial Safety US Citizen Current member of ASSP Primarily responsible for own financial support Provide two letters of recommendation from faculty member or employment supervisor Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies
criteria.raw_text: SIS_College is Education and Prof Studies

criteria.description: SIS_Major is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major is Occupational Safety   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Occupational Safety   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Occupational Safety
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major is Occupational Safety   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Occupational Safety   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Industrial Safety   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Occupational Safety

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
